unknown.title: Error
unknown.desc: An error occurred while signing in, please try again. If the problem persists, please contact support via Discord

database.title: Database Error
database.desc: There is an issue with the database, please check the Docker logs or contact support via Discord

account_sso.title: SSO Login Error
account_sso.desc: It looks like you tried to use SSO with a non-existent account. Please try again or contact your administrator to set up your account first
